Event.Message: Authentication succeeded for user %1, in domain %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Domain" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Username" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Authentication failed for user %1, in domain %2, with error %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Domain" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Username" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="int1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Authentication failed for user %1, in domain %2 because it was attempted outside permitted logon hours.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Domain" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Username" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Authentication failed for user %1, in domain %2 because the user account is disabled.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Domain" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Username" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Authentication failed for user %1, in domain %2 because the user's password has expired.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Domain" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Username" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Authentication failed for user %1, in domain %2 because the user does not have dial-in permission.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Domain" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Username" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The user's effort to change their password failed. Username: %1. Domain: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Domain" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Username" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
